author: parithosh
content: Has everyone already turned off their Pyrmont validators? Is it safe for the EF to turn theirs off as well or are there still scenario's people want to see?

content: Dunno who is/isn't using pyrmont, but my node is fully connected with 128 peers so there are quite a few nodes out there still operating.
